Description:
Californian Charm on the College Door
Backing onto McKinnon Secondary College with its own private access, this mesmerizing 3-4 bedroom 2 bathroom Californian Bungalow has a family heart and an entertaining soul. A tree-lined central walkway is an attractive entry to this ground-floor apartment, which has a flood of natural light, sleek presentation, gleaming timber floorboards and all those low maintenance qualities that ensure a relaxing lifestyle. Stroll to the shops, dash to the station, let the kids walk to school....enjoy this super central, blue chip GRZ1 & McKinnon Secondary College zone address. Just minutes from Ormond & McKinnon shops, restaurant and rail strips and a walk to the College, this four bedroom, two bathroom home opens up beyond a streamlined rendered facade to offer an easy care dual zone floorplan with an entertaining bonus!
Designed for easy living with glossy polished porcelain tiled floors flowing through a quiet formal lounge and out to sun filled casual living dining, this entertaining home steps out through glass doors to an elevated undercover west facing alfresco area...and on to a clever separate entertainers' room or teenager retreat or over flow accommodation with more polished porcelain flooring and its own high quality second kitchen area.
Prestige appointed with a European appliance kitchen, a luxurious private ensuite and main spa bathroom, the home justifies its blue chip location with ducted heating, reverse cycle air conditioning, an alarm and flexible open garage. With luxury finishes including granite benchtops even for the laundry, marble inlaid floors and generous robes, this is stylish living in a Gold Star lifestyle location.

Description:
Stylishly Refreshed & Perfectly Located
Defined by light-splashed interior spaces and generous yet low maintenance gardens, this beautifully refreshed 2-bedroom unit delivers that elusive laidback lifestyle so many crave. Just moments to Ormond station, shops, cafes and attractions, this smartly updated villa is situated at the front of a well-maintained boutique group. Warm and welcoming, the stylish base opens to reveal on-trend oak floors and crisp white walls which flow through the open plan living and dining area. Bathed in natural sunlight, this well-sized space leads to a new designer kitchen with quality European appliances and luxe stone benchtops - the perfect setting for family and friends to gather.
Both tranquil bedrooms are able to accommodate doubles with ease and benefit from walk-in robes; they share a radiant fully-tiled bathroom complete with luxe frameless shower. Boasting larger than most wraparound gardens, this impeccable home also features split system heating and cooling plus a secure two car carport with laneway access. Whether you are seeking a savvy investment, fresh first home or well-located downsizer, this chic villa certainly ticks all the boxes.

Description:
A Seamless Blend of Charm & Family
Absolutely irresistible, this heartwarming 4 bedroom 2 bathroom timber Californian Bungalow has a love for family living with poolside entertaining. Beautiful with its Baltic pine polished boards, leadlight windows, high intricate ceilings and open fireplaces, this engaging treasure features a double leadlight door entry, wide entry foyer, double doors to a delightful lounge (OFP), gorgeous dining room (OFP), 4 good size bedrooms (custom BIRs), terrazzo stone kitchen (Smeg 900mm stove & walk in pantry) overlooking the sun drenched family room, 2 neutral toned porcelain bathrooms, fitted laundry and separate toilet. The west-facing rear garden features an elevated covered deck (bi-fold doors) overlooking the landscaped rear garden which features a solar heated pool, alfresco area, vegie patch and a workshop. With all the modern comforts serviced or renewed in the last 12 months, it's like buying a brand new home, complete with plantation shutters, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ceiling fans, instant hot water with temperature control, an alarm system, double blinds, excellent storage and parking for 2. In the sought after McKinnon Secondary College zone in this friendly street, a short stroll to North Road and McKinnon Village shops, cafes and restaurants, 2 train stations, Ormond Primary School & St Kevins Catholic School.
